name: The Great Mikanko Ceremony
text: Special Summon 1 "Mikanko" monster from your hand, ignoring its Summoning conditions, but return it to the hand during your opponent's End Phase. During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY; send 1 "Mikanko" card from your Deck to the GY, except "The Great Mikanko Ceremony". You can only use each effect of "The Great Mikanko Ceremony" once per turn.
